argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the option was successful.

page.description: Sets the version number of the Application
page.discussion: The A5_SetAppVersionNumber() function sets an application's version number. This is the same version number that can be set on the Network Optimization dialog. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.description: You can also set the version number using the A5_SAVE_SETTINGS()function.
section.example: dim ptr as P a5_load_settings("NetworkOptimize", ptr) ? ptr = check_portion = 1 outofdate_flag = 2 version_number = 1.2 ptr.version_number = 1.3 a5_save_settings("NetworkOptimize",ptr) a5_load_settings("NetworkOptimize",ptr) ? ptr = check_portion = 1 outofdate_flag = 2 version_number = 1.3
